headline: Bunge nears China ruling for $8.2 billion Viterra merger, Bloomberg News reports
summary: U.S. grains merchant Bunge is close to getting a ruling from Chinese regulators on its $8.2 billion purchase of Glencore-backed Viterra with a verdict expected within days, Bloomberg News reported on...
